backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing app state with screen navigation and balloon-popping logic, including validation and state queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend files, screens, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH variables, theming, dark mode values, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app root for consistent typography on first paint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating screen flow with fade transitions and guarded navigation using React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/Balloon.tsx: Balloon SVG component with float and pop animations, click handling, and popped-state display.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Component generating 50 animated confetti pieces with randomized colors, timing, and falling behavior.
frontend/src/components/FramedPhoto.tsx: Photo component with royal-style frame, sparkles, load skeleton, and fallback handling for image errors.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCtaButton: Reusable CTA button with themed variants and Tailwind styling wrapped around a base UI button.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanImage.tsx: Image viewer with zoom, pan, reset controls, load states, error display, and gesture-based interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in react-query hooks for fetching app state and running mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useZoomPan.ts: Implements zoom and pan logic with wheel and pointer controls, managing scale and translation constraints.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, custom animations, and decorative styling including a gold frame.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BalloonScreen.tsx: Renders a balloon-popping mini game that advances after all balloons are popped.
frontend/src/pages/CakeScreen.tsx: Displays a birthday cake screen with confetti and a button leading to the balloon game.
frontend/src/pages/FinalScreen.tsx: Displays the final birthday screen with animated hearts, a message reveal, and a restart button.
frontend/src/pages/HandwrittenNoteScreen: Shows a decorative handwritten note card with sparkles and a button to proceed.
frontend/src/pages/IntroScreen.tsx: Intro page featuring a cute panda, birthday text, and a button to start the experience.
frontend/src/pages/LoadingScreen.tsx: Displays a loading animation with a progress bar before transitioning to the next screen.
frontend/src/pages/MessageScreen1.tsx: Interactive message card that reveals a photo and birthday message when opened, with a next button.
frontend/src/pages/MessageScreen2.tsx: Second interactive message card showing a photo, emojis, and a birthday greeting before continuing.
frontend/src/pages/PreFinalLoadingScreen: Pre-final loading screen with progress tracking and animated emojis before the final reveal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, shadows, and enabling plugin support.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and a detailed list of existing interactive birthdayâ€‘app features, covering screen flow, animations, UI components, and backend intentions. Serves as the canonical state and feature registry for the project.
